Package xxl.util

This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayResizer The ArrayResizer provides methods that allow to modify the size of a given array after its construction.
BitSet This class is a replacement for java.util.BitSet which neither implements the interfaces Covertable nor Comparable.
Interval1D Class to implement one-dimensional intervals of any ordered data type.
IntervalND Class to implement multi-dimensional intervals based on n intervals of class Interval1D.
Math The class Math contains methods with regard to extend the basic numeric operations of java.lang.Math.
Tuple This class implements an n-Tuple of objects.
XXLSystem The XXLSystem class contains two static methods to determine the memory size of an object.
XXLSystem.Wrapper This class is a Wrapper for objects with the intention to distinguish two objects if and only if they refer to the same object.
 

Exception Summary
WrappingRuntimeException This Exception is useful for wrapping arbitrary Exceptions.
 

Package xxl.util Description

This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package. It contains classes to create and work with one- or multidimensional intervals and tuples or even bit sets, a class to work dynamically with arrays and a class delivering a new RuntimeException thats wraps arbitary exceptions.
